document.full_text: nasdaq omx group inc  told investors it could sell nyse euronext's  american stock exchange and offer a break-up fee to overcome antitrust concerns in its $11.3 billion bid for the big board parent, a source familiar with the situation said on friday.
document.title: nasdaq open to selling amex in nyse bid: source
lines_and_colors: nasdaq omx group inc  told investors it could sell nyse euronext's  american stock exchange and offer a break-up fee to overcome antitrust concerns in its $11.3 billion bid for the big board parent, a source familiar with the situation said on friday.
